course_title: Topics in African American Studies: African American Soundscapes
class_notes: Same as MUS_OX 389R with the topic as "African American Soundscapes."
course_description: This course explores one of a wide range of topics pertaining to the African American experience in the fields of human and civil rights, the arts, social and literary texts, and the social sciences. May be cross-listed with MUS 389R when the topic is the same.
sections: Class Nbr: 4440, Section #: 2, Type: LEC, Campus: OXF, Meets: MW 4-5:15p, Instructor: M. McNeill, Status: Open
